sentences.english: Thirdly, to obtain employment successfully, ex-servicemen should bring into play their predominance themselves too.
sentences.chinese: 再者，退役军人在就业时也应当注意发挥自身优势。

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 战俘依然受军法约束，以及军人守则的道德指导。

sentences.english: But the snag was that the Manchus were outnumbered by Han troops in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 但那时，北京的汉族军人数量已经超过了满族军人。

sentences.english: But the snag was that the Manchus were outnumbered by Han troops in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 但那时，北京的汉族军人数量已经超过了满族军人。

sentences.english: He said so, just let a person remember, originally he is really a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 他这样一说，才让人想起，原来他真的是一个军人。

sentences.english: A North Korean soldier stared at them from just a few centimeters away, through a window.
sentences.chinese: 一名北韩军人在几公分外的窗口另一侧注视着他们。

sentences.english: This is an organization in charge of the affairs of the disabled ex-service men.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个负责退役残疾军人事务的组织。

sentences.english: De Gaulle was, at that time, considered a disloyal soldier.
sentences.chinese: 当时戴高乐被看作是一个不忠实的军人。

sentences.english: As a qualified soldier, you must keep your uniform tidy and have powerful posture.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个合格的军人，必须仪表整洁军姿威武。

sentences.english: Today, more than 850,000 veterans remain unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 今天，超过85万退伍军人仍在失业。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experiences in the diagnosis and therapy of hyperventilation syndrome of yong servicemen.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结青年军人过度通气综合征的诊断与治疗经验。

sentences.english: A poster with the core values of contemporary revolutionary soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 这是印发部队的当代革命军人核心价值观宣传画。

sentences.english: Her father was in the army and the family led a peripatetic existence.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲是军人，所以全家人随军过着一种流动的生活。

sentences.english: That's one of the problems you get if you are a leading figure in sport.
sentences.chinese: 在体育圈成为一个领军人物，会导致一个问题。

sentences.english: But what of the combat veterans who don't suffer from PTSD?
sentences.chinese: 但那些没有患上PTSD的退伍军人情况又是怎样呢？

sentences.english: I was surprised at her marriage to a disabled army man.
sentences.chinese: 她嫁给一个残废军人使我惊讶。

definition: guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
warrant officer/petty officer/noncommissioned officer (NCO)/Japanese military officer
to serve in the army/to be a soldier
